translation: "Dao" in Chinese is an interesting concept.
transcript: 中国这个道很有意思。

translation: It can refer to "speech", "the principles behind words" or " the way of framing one's words".
transcript: 既是说话，又是说话里面隐含的道理，还有话到底怎么说。

translation: We grow up with certain common-sense truths.
transcript: 我们生活中间有许多常识性的真理，从小到大耳濡目染。

translation: And we regard them as the doctrines that we should act by.
transcript: 我们都把它们看作行动的指南。

translation: There is a saying goes, "three cobblers with their wits combined exceed that of ZHUGE Liang, the mastermind".
transcript: 比如说有一句话叫，“三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮”。

translation: We would all agree that when something happens, it is of little use to seek the opinions of the experts.
transcript: 大家都知道，遇到事情不要去等着听专家的意见。

translation: There is a high possibility that the so-called professors and scholars knew no better than we do.
transcript: 什么教授、学者，好多时候不过就是另一个行业的臭皮匠。

translation: However, deep inside we all wish to be "the master mind" of all time rather than the "cobblers".
transcript: 但是我们每个人心里面又暗暗有一种期待，我们希望自己永远做诸葛亮，不要做臭皮匠。

translation: However, what if we can't be the "master mind"?
transcript: 但是做不了诸葛亮怎么办？

translation: In that case, we can find two more "cobblers" and pull our strength together to outwit the "master mind".
transcript: 我们就三个人合伙，准备好顶过一个诸葛亮。

translation: We hear this saying so often that we start to believe teamwork will always work.
transcript: 这样的话说得多了以后，让我们自然而然觉得群策群力就能解决问题。

translation: If we all contribute to the discussions, we can always come up with a solution, or a good idea.
transcript: 只要大家商量商量，一切事情都好办，总有好主意。

translation: However, if you give a second thought on this saying, you will find it problematic.
transcript: 可是你要认真的去思考一下，发现这句话里面还是有许多问题的。

translation: Is there anyone who has read the Romance of the Three Kingdoms?
transcript: 如果在座各位看过《三国演义》的话？

translation: It is said the best way to read the Romance of the Three Kingdoms is to start from the middle part rather than from the beginning.
transcript: 都知道《三国演义》怎么看，不是从头看起，是从中间看起。

translation: Then which chapter should we start with?
transcript: 从哪一章节看起？

translation: The chapter of “Three Visits to the Thatched Cottage".
transcript: 就从“隆中对三顾茅庐”看起。

translation: In the first half of the novel, Liu Bei suffered defeat repeatedly, but in the latter half, he achieved victory one after another.
transcript: 前面半本是刘备屡战屡败，后面半部是刘备越战越勇。

translation: Why?
transcript: 什么道理？

translation: It is because of Zhuge Liang.
transcript: 就是因为有了诸葛亮。

translation: Therefore, the key lies in the "master mind" of the group.
transcript: 所以有没有诸葛亮是一个大问题。

translation: The saying "three cobblers with their wits combined exceed that of ZHUGE Liang, the mastermind" tells only part of the story.
transcript: 三个臭皮匠能不能顶个诸葛亮，还有好多没有说清楚的地方。

translation: In fact, it is only a well-intentioned daydream to assume that "three cobblers with their wits combined could exceed that of ZHUGE Liang, the mastermind" .
transcript: 其实三个臭皮匠，要顶一个诸葛亮，那是美梦。

translation: We all know that even when three "master minds" work together, they would end up with a worse outcome, not to mention the "cobblers".
transcript: 因为我们知道人在一起的时候，不要说臭皮匠，就哪怕三个诸葛亮，要在一起的话，只会把活越干越糟糕。

translation: Actually, research in social psychology has proven that when people gather, they tend to act in a similar way as the rest of the group.
transcript: 因为在社会心理学上面有研究成果表明，人集体生活放在一起，大家会相互感染。

translation: This "infection" will lead to a very interesting psychological phenomenon, in which everyone want to get approval from others.
transcript: 这个感染的时候就会产生一种很有意思的心理现象，就每个人说话希望得到别人的认同。

translation: As an old Chinese saying goes, "when two people get into a quarrel, they will ask a third one to judge who is right regardless of the intelligence of the third party."
transcript: 中国古时候就有人说过，两个人吵架，第三个人不用很聪明，就会被两个人拿来当法官。

translation: Do we have a similar experience in our lives?
transcript: 我们生活中间有没有这种情况？

translation: When we get into a quarrel with a colleague, a friend, or a relative, we automatically go to another person and regard him as a judge.
transcript: 同同事了、同朋友了、同亲戚了，吵架的时候我们都会自觉不自觉地去找一个人，请他来评评理。

translation: At first, we were just arguing who is right and who is wrong, but without even realizing it, we started trying to win the support of the third party while proving the other party as wrong.
transcript: 而我们本来是同对方在争论某一件事情你对还是我错，可是不知不觉中间，我们却开始尽量地让自己讲的道理，不但要压倒我的对手，还要争取到第三方的同情。

translation: As a result, we will find that the original positions and ideas of both parties began to change.
transcript: 这么一来转转着转着，大家就发现两个人原来的观点、立场都开始发生了变化。

translation: This is because we behave differently under the influence of the companion we keep.
transcript: 这就是我们人在生活中间因为人与人的关系，发生的一些悄悄的变化。

translation: Therefore, this is the same case when the three "cobblers" come together and have a discussion.
transcript: 所以当三个臭皮匠一起在那里讨论问题的时候，同样会发生这种情况。

translation: At first, each of them had their own position, but as the discussion progressed, they began to accommodate to others' opinions to win their support.
transcript: 本来三个臭皮匠各人有各人的观点，但是随着讨论的进行，我们开始迁就别人的观点，争取获得最多的人的拥护。

translation: This happens not only among a group of "cobblers" but also among a crowd of senior staff and elites.
transcript: 这样一个情形不但出现在智商程度不高的臭皮匠那里，还会出现在高级人员、精英、集体讨论中。

translation: Why?
transcript: 什么道理？

translation: Why do people become stupid when we are together?
transcript: 为什么人在一起，就会变得观点越来越愚蠢？

translation: It is an easy question.
transcript: 很简单。

translation: It is because consciously or unconsciously, we all want to be recognized by others.
transcript: 就是所有的人都自觉不自觉地希望得到别人的认同。

translation: To be recognized, we would have to adjust our position and appeal to others, and lower our IQ.
transcript: 而为了争取别人的认同我们不能不把自己原有的观点，棱角给磨平了，把自己的智商水平给降低了。

translation: In my experience of doing TV shows, I found a phenomenon that will easily affect the position of the TV guest.
transcript: 以我做电视节目那么多的经验，发现一条很容易影响一个电视嘉宾的立场的现象。

translation: That is, too much care about the audience ratings will automatically lower our intelligence level.
transcript: 就当我们想着去追求收视率的时候，我会自觉不自觉地把智商降低。

translation: I once did some live TV shows.
transcript: 我在一些地方做地节目，直播的。

translation: I paid attention to not only the audience ratings on the whole but also that by minute.
transcript: 那我不但要看它的收视率的统计数字，还要看它分钟收视率。

translation: Why did I pay attention to audience ratings per minutes?
transcript: 为什么看分钟收视率呢？

translation: Just to find out how high the ratings are when I was speaking.
transcript: 就是为了知道我讲话的时候，收视率到底多高。

translation: I guess this is also a kind of narcissism.
transcript: 这也算一种自恋。

translation: However, after knowing it, I will automatically think about how to raise the ratings higher.
transcript: 但是看完以后，以后就会自觉不自觉地动脑筋，怎么让收视率提得高一点。

translation: For example, once after a show, I looked at the audience rating by minute and found that, out of the ten points where the viewership exceeded 3% I had seven.
transcript: 比如有一次我看到，一档节目完了之后，我拿到了那个分钟收视率，其中有十个点上收视率超过了3%，发现自己里面占了七个。

translation: This was quite fulfilling.
transcript: 很有成就感。

translation: However, during such a process, as I went on, I felt wrong.
transcript: 但是在这样一个过程中间，走着走着就发现不对了。

translation: My ideas and opinions were getting more and more predictable.
transcript: 我的讲话、观点被磨得越来越圆了。

translation: I was appealing to the audience.
transcript: 我要去让更多的人接受我。

translation: However, looking back at what I said, I felt sorry for myself.
transcript: 但是再回过头来看看，自己的那个观点好像越来越对不起自己了。

translation: In fact, high ratings are easy to get.
transcript: 其实收视率是很简单的事情。

translation: We all know that suppose there is a human intelligence pyramid; there are fewer with a higher IQ and more with lower IQ.
transcript: 我们都知道人类的智商是金字塔，越是智商高的人越少，智商低的人越多。

translation: Therefore, when you are pursuing the ratings, you will unconsciously win audience from the lower layer.
transcript: 所以当你一个人在追求收视率的时候，你就会自觉不自觉地向下面去打捞你的听众。

translation: When your ratings are large enough, it means that now you have more audience from the bottom of the pyramid, where there are many cobblers.
transcript: 而等到你收视率足够多的时候，那就意味着最底层的都被你给打捞上来了，这里边就是有大量的臭皮匠。

translation: This suggest that the idea of “three cobblers outwitting a master mind" is unreliable.
transcript: 那么这样一种现象告诉我们，“三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮”其实是靠不住的。

translation: Therefore, if we expect to bring together a crowd of people with general intelligence to come up with a genius idea, we are likely to be disappointed.
transcript: 所以我们如果寄希望于把好多智商一般的人聚集到一起来，想从里面获得高大上的点子很难。

translation: Therefore, I remember being told by my mother as a child that “better work for a wise man than advise a fool."
transcript: 所以我记得我小时候母亲就同我说的过“宁可给聪明人提包，也不要给笨蛋出主意。”

translation: What she means is that we will learn much from working for a smart person and come to think in a smarter way.
transcript: 她的意思就是说给聪明人提包，你也能学到一些东西，变得越来越聪明。

translation: That is what we call "learn from those who do better." in Chinese.
transcript: 用中国话来说就学着点。

translation: However, after you give advice to a slow-witted person, on the one hand, he may fail to execute it rightly.
transcript: 但是给笨人出主意之后，一个他做不好。

translation: On the other hand, you may have to accommodate to him and you may come to think as he does.
transcript: 另外一个你要迁就他，也会变得越来越愚蠢。

translation: And the other way round, if no three cobblers can ever outperform a mastermind, then why do we have such a saying?
transcript: 但是我们反过来说，如果真的是三个臭皮匠顶不了一个诸葛亮的话，那我们何以又会出现这样的说法呢？

translation: So, as I see it, the right question to ask is that under what conditions can the cobbler outwit a master mind?
transcript: 所以我想这里边的问题，可能在于我们是不是该换个角度，什么样的条件下臭皮匠能够顶诸葛亮呢。

translation: I was once asked a question many years ago.
transcript: 记得好多年前有人问过我一个问题。

translation: At that time the planned economy has just been replaced by the market economy and the former state-owned vegetable market replaced by today’s farmer markets.
transcript: 那是计划经济刚刚转到市市场经济，同以前国有的菜市场变革为今天的农贸市场的时候。

translation: One elder asked, "In the past, before we open the market every day, we received the order from higher authorities of what to sell and how to price"
transcript: 有一个长者就问过我一句话，他说：“过去我们菜市场，每天开秤的时候，都有上面一级一级下达今天什么菜，卖什么价格的命令。”

translation: He said, "Now on the farmer markets, every trader makes his own decision, but why their pricing are still the same? Do they meet together before the market opens and set out a pricing otherwise why does everyone sell at the same price?"
transcript: 他说：“现在到了农贸市场，每个人都是独立自主了，怎么最后价格还是一样的。农贸市场的小贩是不是每天开秤之前，也要开一个小组会，大家一起讨论出一个统一的价格，否则怎么会都卖成一个模样了呢？”

translation: Is this idea understandable?
transcript: 这个想法正常吗？

translation: It is understandable.
transcript: 很正常。

translation: Because many of us find it difficult to switch from one mode to another.
transcript: 因为从一种模式到另外一种模式，这个过渡好多的人一时转不过来。

translation: What's more important is that there is actually one thing hidden in his mind.
transcript: 更重要的是在他的脑子里面其实隐含了一样东西。

translation: He thinks that the most reasonable way in our society often comes from self-consciousness.
transcript: 就说我们这个社会中间最合理的办法，往往是要出自于一个自觉的意识。

translation: So today, when we talk about whether three “cobblers” can outwit a “master mind”, it does not mean that the decision negotiated by the three would be better than that of the “master mind”.
transcript: 所以我们今天讲三个臭皮匠能不能顶一个诸葛亮，不是三个臭皮匠商量好了我们要去战胜一个诸葛亮。

translation: What we mean is that if each of us makes our own decisions and take action accordingly, we can do something that is impossible for a “master mind” alone.
transcript: 而是我们每个人按照自己的方法做出我们的决策和行动，最后达到的那个效果却是任何一个诸葛亮都做不到的。

translation: So let us look back and think about why China has developed so fast in the past 30 years?
transcript: 所以我们回过头来想想，三十多年中中国为什么变得那么快？

translation: It is an easy question.
transcript: 很简单。

translation: It is because we have given the decision of pricing back to the hands of every "cobbler" from the single hand of the "master mind".
transcript: 就是因为我们把过去由某一个人决定的价格交给了由许许多多臭皮匠，自己来决定价格。

translation: This price is far more reasonable and works better in resource allocation than a price set by a "master mind".
transcript: 而这个价格的合理性，对于我们资源配置起的作用远远要比任何一个诸葛亮的定价更加合理。

translation: How to decide the next mechanism of pricing for China?
transcript: 中国再往后这样一个价格发现的机制在哪里？

translation: The price on our mind is no longer the price of products on the farmer markets, but the price of something that is of greatest significance today, our creation and invention.
transcript: 我们讲的价格不再是农贸市场上的价格，而是讲我们今天最最重要的一样价格，就是我们的创造和发明。

translation: We know that many people think that it took the West countries two or three hundred years to achieve what China has achieved in the past 30 years.
transcript: 我们知道有许多人认为中国三十多年中发展的计划，走了西方两三百年的道路。

translation: Naturally, we feel so proud.
transcript: 所以我们很自豪。

translation: Under this circumstance of excitement, a very sensible voice stood out.
transcript: 在这种亢奋的情景中，我听到了一个非常理智的声音。

translation: It said: "It is easy to answer why it only took China 20 or 30 years to achieve what the Western countries have achieved in 2 or 3 hundred years. Because when the West Countries were forging ahead, they were opening up a new path so they traveled slowly. But China is moving forward on the road that has been forged by the forerunners, so it was able to go faster."
transcript: 他说：“中国之所以在二三十年中走了西方两三百年的路，很简单，因为西方在往前走的时候，它是一边开路往前走的，这个速度自然就慢；而中国是在别人开好的路上往前走的，所以这个速度自然就要比别人快得多。”

translation: So where are we today?
transcript: 那么今天到了什么时候呢？

translation: Those who have been forging the new path in front of us are continuing their work.
transcript: 到了别人路开的，还在继续开。

translation: However, we are not welcomed to follow them.
transcript: 但是留给我们的路已经不多了。

translation: We are nearly reaching our end.
transcript: 我们已经走到这条路的尽头了。

translation: Now it is time we forge a new path along with others rather than take a ready-made road.
transcript: 下面就需要我们跟着别人一起开路而不能再走别人开好的现成的路了。

translation: In the past when we talk about "learning", we are actually talking about following suit.
transcript: 这也就是我们过去讲学习、学习，学习就是在走别人走过的路。

translation: Today we find that there is less and less to learn from; there is less and less others are willing to share with us; it is becoming harder and harder to learn through technology acquisition.
transcript: 今天我们发现可以学习的东西越来越少，别人愿意让我们学的东西越来越少，我们可以通过买技术消化提升的东西越来越少。

translation: When we traverse further down the road, how to decide the next "market price"?
transcript: 需要我们往前再走一步的时候，我们这个市场价格在哪里？

translation: Can we find a way to enable more people to take part in and act together to generate the effect that "1.3 billion cobblers with their wits combined exceed that of ZHUGE Liang, the mastermind".
transcript: 我们能不能继续让更多的人用他的思考，用他的行动，最后产生出一个十三亿个臭皮匠顶上任何一个诸葛亮的效果。

translation: What we need today is not a master mind who decides for us what to create, what to think about and what to do.
transcript: 今天需要的不是任何一个英明的人，他在决定着我们能够创造什么，能够思考什么，能够行动什么。

translation: What we need is an environment in which all of us can contribute our wisdom and take ac act so we make something extraordinary happen.
transcript: 而是需要有一个场景，在这个场景里面我们所有人的思考，所有人的行动，最后得出一个意想不到的结果。

translation: Thank you all.
transcript: 谢谢大家。
